00001 from wx.glcanvas import GLCanvas
00002 import wx
00003 from OpenGL.GLUT import *
00004 from OpenGL.GLU import *
00005 from OpenGL.GL import *
00006 
00007 name = 'ball_glut'
00008 
00009 class myGLCanvas(GLCanvas):
00010     def __init__(self, parent, color = [1.0,0.,0.,1.]):
00011         GLCanvas.__init__(self, parent,-1)
00012         wx.EVT_PAINT(self, self.OnPaint)
00013         self.init = 0
00014         self.color = color
00015         wx.EVT_CHAR(self, self.OnKey)
00016 
00017         self.Bind(wx.EVT_SIZE, self.processSizeEvent, self)
00018 
00019 
00020     def OnKey(self, event):
00021         keycode = chr(event.GetKeyCode())
00022         if keycode == 'j':
00023             print 'a was pressed'
00024 
00025     def OnPaint(self,event):
00026         dc = wx.PaintDC(self)
00027         self.SetCurrent()
00028         if not self.init:
00029             self.InitGL()
00030             self.init = 1
00031         self.OnDraw()
00032         return
00033 
00034     def OnReshape(self, width, height):
00035         """Reshape the OpenGL viewport based on the dimensions of the window."""
00036         glViewport(0, 0, width, height)
00037         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00038         glLoadIdentity()
00039         gluPerspective(40.0, float(width)/height, 0.1, 30.0)
00040 
00041     
00042     def GetGLExtents(self):
00043         """Get the extents of the OpenGL canvas."""
00044         return self.GetClientSize()
00045 
00046     def processSizeEvent(self, event):
00047         """Process the resize event.""" 
00048         if self.GetContext():
00049             # Make sure the frame is shown before calling SetCurrent.
00050             self.Show()
00051             self.SetCurrent()
00052             
00053             size = self.GetGLExtents()
00054             self.OnReshape(size.width, size.height)
00055             self.Refresh(False)
00056         event.Skip()
00057 
00058 
00059     def OnDraw(self):
00060         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT)
00061         glPushMatrix()
00062         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT,GL_DIFFUSE,self.color)
00063         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES)
00064         glVertex( 1.0, 0.0, 0.0 )
00065         glVertex( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 )
00066         glVertex( -1.0, 0.0, 0.0 )
00067         glEnd()
00068         glPopMatrix()
00069         self.SwapBuffers()
00070         return
00071         
00072     def InitGL(self):
00073         # set viewing projection
00074         light_diffuse = [1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0]
00075         light_position = [1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0]
00076 
00077         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, light_diffuse)
00078         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, light_position)
00079 
00080         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING)
00081         glEnable(GL_LIGHT0)
00082         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00083         glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
00084         glClearDepth(1.0)
00085 
00086         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00087         glLoadIdentity()
00088         gluPerspective(40.0, 1.0, 1.0, 30.0)
00089 
00090         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW)
00091         glLoadIdentity()
00092         gluLookAt(0.0, 0.0, 10.0,
00093                   0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00094                   0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00095         return
00096 
00097 
00098 class M(wx.Panel):
00099     def __init__(self, parent):
00100         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent)
00101         glutInit(' ')
00102         ball1 = myGLCanvas(self, color = [0.0,0.0,1.0,0.0])
00103         ball2 = myGLCanvas(self)
00104 
00105         sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00106         sizer.Add(ball1, 1, wx.EXPAND)
00107         sizer.Add(ball2, 1, wx.EXPAND)
00108         self.SetSizer(sizer)
00109     
00110 
00111 def main():
00112     app = wx.PySimpleApp()
00113     frame = wx.Frame(None,-1,'ball_wx', wx.DefaultPosition, wx.Size(400,400))
00114     #canvas = myGLCanvas(frame)
00115     panel = M(frame)
00116     frame.Show()
00117     app.MainLoop()
